__e: Today's the first day so you don't have to cook dinner.
Well, I've been asked to vacate the premises, but that's why you're here, isn't it?
But I may need to ask you to do a thing or two as well.
I don't know what the fuss is all about-- so I requested a ground floor room at my hotel.
I asked for no such Thing.

Along with all the facts in the original prosecution, the court has requested general testimony on profiling from someone other than me, someone who can explain how it works and who has no skin in the game.
I've issued a warrant for your daughter's arrest.
I called the husband right away, and when he didn't get back to me, I got a warrant for his credit cards.
Somehow she, or whoever's helping her, ordered a Black Warrant on Johnny.
Spent a lot of time and money.
I can see why my superiors required my presence here. Your camp is impressive.
If you don't trust me, then why request me for this?
I think your husband... I think he may have brought that to my attention.
I have asked you here to discuss a mutual problem, Captain.
Ma'am, His Majesty has requested you attend him in his study.
I have requested his presence in court today.
We are giving him everything we have, just like the family requested.
But that's not why I asked for this meeting.
- Then you're of no use to me.
Sir, I've requested his help on a developing case.
And for how many hours a week were you asked to help him?
I don't remember asking for your help!
- Except lawyers being lawyers, she's petitioned that you stay 1,000 feet away from him.
Who requested that you come to work?
In this case, the parents request no onward contact.
